docket_entries.description: Chapter 7 Voluntary Petition, filing fee to be paid in the amount of 299.00 dollars. Incomplete Filings due by 11/30/2009. (Baehr, J.) (Entered: 11/13/2009)

Meeting of Creditors to be held on 12/29/2009 at 09:00 AM at US Crthouse,Rm 2110B, 400 E. 9th St., Kansas City, MO. Objections for Discharge due by 02/27/2010. Transmitted to the BNC for Service. ( Baehr, J.) (Entered: 11/13/2009)
BNC Certificate of Mailing Service Date 11/15/2009. (Related Doc # 7 ) (Admin.) (Entered: 11/16/2009)

Order to Debtor(s) to Show Cause why the order for relief should not be set aside and these bankruptcy proceedings dismissed for failure to provide Schedules A-J, Statement of Financial Affairs, Statement of Current Monthly Income - Means Test, Summary of Schedules and Statistical Summary of Certain Liabilities, Declaration/Verification of Schedules, and Debtors Evidence of Employer Payments (60 days) or Debtors Evidence of NO Employer Payments. This case was filed under the new Bankruptcy Abuse Prevention and Consumer Protection Act of 2005. To satisfy this mandate, you are directed to file the appropriate document(s). This order will be deemed vacated upon timely compliance with its provisions. So ORDERED by /s/ Arthur B. Federman Incomplete Filings due by 12/1/2009. Statement of Intent due by 12/16/2009. (Shannon, Kirsten)The Court will serve this Order on parties not receiving electronic notice.This Notice of Electronic Filing is the Official ORDER for this entry. No document is attached. (Entered: 11/16/2009)
Debtor's Declaration Re: Electronic Filing . (Shannon, Kirsten) (Entered: 11/23/2009)
Schedule(s) A-J, Statement of Financial Affairs, Form 22 filed by Gary Ned McClung, Leona Belle McClung (Baehr, J.) (Entered: 12/01/2009)

No document is attached. (Entered: 01/07/2010)

Trustee anticipates receiving or has collected funds for the estate and Requests the Clerk of Court to set a bar date for filing a Proof of Claim and send notice of the date to all creditors. Filed by Janice E. Stanton. (Stanton, Janice) (Entered: 01/11/2010)

Notice to Creditors to File Claims. (The Bankruptcy Noticing Center will serve this notice on all creditors and parties.There is no document attached to this entry. It will be attached to the BNC Certificate of Mailing.) Proof of Claims due by 4/14/2010. (Shannon, Kirsten) (Entered: 01/12/2010)
BNC Certificate of Mailing Service Date 01/14/2010. (Related Doc # 16 ) (Admin.) (Entered: 01/15/2010)

Clerk's Notice to Debtor(s) re: Personal Financial Management Instructional Course. The debtor(s) certification of completion for this course has NOT BEEN FILED. If the certification is not received by the last day to object to the discharge of the debtor, the case may be closed with NO Discharge. If the debtor(s) subsequently file(s) a motion to reopen the case to allow filing of the Certification of Completion of Instructional Course Concerning Personal Financial Management (Form B 23), the debtor(s) MUST pay the full reopening filing fee. (ADIclerk) (Entered: 01/18/2010)

Certificate of Service on Ex Parte Order of the Court Granting the Trustee's Motion to Employ Stanton & Redlingshafer, L.L.C. as Attorneys for Trustee filed by Janice E. Stanton (related document(s) 14 Trustee Employ Attorney) (Stanton, Janice) (Entered: 01/18/2010)
